summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 19 and 20, Supplemental Crown Addition, being the alley from West Howe Street to West Blaine Street, between 10th Avenue West to 11th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 111858 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
